title: Poster, "Nouvelle Vague", 1990
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On a white field, the word "Nouvelle", in black above "Vague", in red, separated by schematic blue wave, with black profile silhouette of man with ruffled hair, looking down. Upper right corner, the text "Jean-Luc Godard."
